segments.text: Observing this kitchen, it's a typical afternoon setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces the sink, towel in hand on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet runs steadily, basin full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflow cascades down, pooling at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She remains focused, unaware of the flow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, cabinets stand with doors ajar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy ascends the stool, hand in cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool leans back precariously under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby extends her arm expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window frames a serene garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the way, fence in the distance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside hazards contrast the outer calm.
segments.speaker: PAR
